Package mvc.view

Interface TextStockView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedTextStockView, SimpleTextStockView
    public interface TextStockView
    The TextStockView interface represents the handling of displaying results, menus, any other messages to the user/system. Changes since P1: This interface was added and methods in the view class were pulled to the interface to allow for a general TextStockView interface with separate implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      The farewellMessage method displays the farewell message.

      The printMenu method displays the main menu.

      The welcomeMessage method displays the welcome message.
      void writeMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      The writeMessage method takes a string input and outputs the corresponding message to the user.
